import urllib.request
import json

url = ''https://hxxtkzshnnrwxvvgtgsh.supabase.co/rest/v1/rpc/search_users_by_email''
key = ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Imh4eHRrenNobm5yd3h2dmd0Z3NoIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NzM1NjU1NCwiZXhwIjoyMDcyOTMyNTU0fQ.pGGb0qwa9AYzVzFkVro8V_jgvFFjQWcieLp9EwvwcXM''

data = json.dumps\({''search_email'': ''test''}\).encode\(\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(url, data=data\)
req.add_header\(''apikey'', key\)
req.add_header\(''Authorization'', ''Bearer '' + key\)
req.add_header\(''Content-Type'', ''application/json''\)
resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
print\(resp.read\(\).decode\(\)[:500]\)
")

Bash(/tmp/fix_fonts.ps1 << 'PSEOF'
Set-StrictMode -Version Latest
$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'

$srcDir = 'C:\\Users\\hboni\\Downloads\\es-lecto-escritura-web-nextjs\\src'

# The broken value \(single-quoted string with nested single-quoted font names\)
# Pattern 1: style={{ fontFamily: ''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif' }}
# Pattern 2: fontFamily: ''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif',  \(inside object\)
# The broken string token is: ''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif'
# We need to replace it with: "Nunito, 'Varela Round', Comfortaa, sans-serif"

$brokenLiteral  = "''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif'"
$fixedLiteral   = '"Nunito, ''Varela Round'', Comfortaa, sans-serif"'

# Find all .tsx and .ts files containing the broken pattern
$files = Get-ChildItem -Path $srcDir -Recurse -Include '*.tsx','*.ts' | Where-Object {
    \(Get-Content -Raw $_.FullName\) -match [regex]::Escape\($brokenLiteral\)
}

Write-Host "Files found with broken pattern: $\($files.Count\)"
foreach \($f in $files\) {
    Write-Host "  $\($f.FullName\)"
}

$totalReplacements = 0

foreach \($file in $files\) {
    $content = Get-Content -Raw $file.FullName

    # Count occurrences
    $count = \([regex]::Matches\($content, [regex]::Escape\($brokenLiteral\)\)\).Count
    Write-Host "`nProcessing: $\($file.Name\) \($count occurrence\(s\)\)"

    # Replace broken literal with correct double-quoted string
    # The replacement value as a real string: "Nunito, 'Varela Round', Comfortaa, sans-serif"
    $replacement = '"Nunito, ' + "'Varela Round'" + ', Comfortaa, sans-serif"'
    $newContent = $content.Replace\($brokenLiteral, $replacement\)

    Set-Content -Path $file.FullName -Value $newContent -NoNewline -Encoding UTF8
    Write-Host "  -> Fixed $count occurrence\(s\)"
    $totalReplacements += $count
}

Write-Host "`nTotal replacements made: $totalReplacements"
PSEOF)

Bash("C:/Users/hboni/Downloads/es-lecto-escritura-web-nextjs/.tmp_scripts/fix_fonts.ps1" << 'PSEOF'
Set-StrictMode -Version Latest
$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'

$srcDir = 'C:\\Users\\hboni\\Downloads\\es-lecto-escritura-web-nextjs\\src'

# Broken literal: ''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif'
# Fixed value  : "Nunito, 'Varela Round', Comfortaa, sans-serif"
$brokenLiteral = "''Nunito', 'Varela Round', 'Comfortaa', sans-serif'"
$replacement   = '"Nunito, ' + "'Varela Round'" + ', Comfortaa, sans-serif"'

Write-Host "Broken literal : $brokenLiteral"
Write-Host "Replacement    : $replacement"
Write-Host ""

$files = Get-ChildItem -Path $srcDir -Recurse -Include '*.tsx','*.ts' | Where-Object {
    \(Get-Content -Raw $_.FullName\) -match [regex]::Escape\($brokenLiteral\)
}

Write-Host "Files found with broken pattern: $\($files.Count\)"
foreach \($f in $files\) {
    Write-Host "  $\($f.FullName\)"
}

$totalReplacements = 0

foreach \($file in $files\) {
    $content = Get-Content -Raw $file.FullName
    $count = \([regex]::Matches\($content, [regex]::Escape\($brokenLiteral\)\)\).Count
    Write-Host ""
    Write-Host "Processing: $\($file.Name\) \($count occurrence\(s\)\)"

    $newContent = $content.Replace\($brokenLiteral, $replacement\)
    Set-Content -Path $file.FullName -Value $newContent -NoNewline -Encoding UTF8
    Write-Host "  -> Fixed $count occurrence\(s\)"
    $totalReplacements += $count
}

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Total replacements made: $totalReplacements"
PSEOF)

Bash(__NEW_LINE_fbede50f24bb7c16__ $sql = @"
-- Insertar namespaces si no existen
INSERT INTO app.translation_namespaces \(slug, name, description\)
VALUES 
  \(''hero'', ''Hero Carousel'', ''Traducciones para el carousel principal de la pagina de inicio''\),
  \(''features'', ''Features Section'', ''Traducciones para la seccion de caracteristicas de la pagina de inicio''\),
  \(''cta'', ''CTA Section'', ''Traducciones para la seccion de llamada a la accion de la pagina de inicio''\)
ON CONFLICT \(slug\) DO NOTHING;

-- badge_explore
INSERT INTO app.translation_keys \(namespace_slug, key_name, description\)
VALUES \(''hero'', ''badge_explore'', ''Badge principal del carousel hero''\)
ON CONFLICT \(namespace_slug, key_name\) DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO app.translations \(translation_key_id, language_code, value\)
SELECT id, ''es'', ''Explorar Contenido'' FROM app.translation_keys
WHERE namespace_slug = ''hero'' AND key_name = ''badge_explore''
ON CONFLICT \(translation_key_id, language_code\) DO UPDATE SET value = EXCLUDED.value;

-- badge_explore_short
INSERT INTO app.translation_keys \(namespace_slug, key_name, description\)
VALUES \(''hero'', ''badge_explore_short'', ''Badge corto del carousel hero \(mobile\)''\)
ON CONFLICT \(namespace_slug, key_name\) DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO app.translations \(translation_key_id, language_code, value\)
SELECT id, ''es'', ''Explorar'' FROM app.translation_keys
WHERE namespace_slug = ''hero'' AND key_name = ''badge_explore_short''
ON CONFLICT \(translation_key_id, language_code\) DO UPDATE SET value = EXCLUDED.value;

-- badge_new
INSERT INTO app.translation_keys \(namespace_slug, key_name, description\)
VALUES \(''hero'', ''badge_new'', ''Badge NUEVO del carousel hero''\)
ON CONFLICT \(namespace_slug, key_name\) DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO app.translations \(translation_key_id, language_code, value\)
SELECT id, ''es'', ''NUEVO'' FROM app.translation_keys
WHERE namespace_slug = ''hero'' AND key_name = ''badge_new''
ON CONFLICT \(translation_key_id, language_code\) DO UPDATE SET value = EXCLUDED.value;

SELECT ''OK badges hero'' as result;
"@)
